articles.author: Christina Maxouris
articles.title: 'We're doing everything we can to survive': As the US looks to move on from Covid-19, high-risk and disabled Americans feel forgotten - CNN
articles.description: Tasha Nelson's 10-year-old son held back tears when he heard the news. The two were in the car when the announcement came through the radio: Virginia's freshly sworn-in governor had signed an order attempting to ban mask mandates in schools.

articles.title: Plant Fossils Found in San Juan Islands Like 'Finding a Penguin in North America' - Centralia Chronicle
articles.description: Fossilized plants discovered in the San Juan Islands have some paleobotanists scratching their heads.  The mystery centers on two fossilized winged fruits discovered by fossil hunters on Sucia  …
